metadata.titleEn: WATER: Dataset of ground truth measurement synchronizing with ALOS PALSAR in the Linze grassland foci experimental area on Jun. 27, 2008
metadata.titleCn: 黑河综合遥感联合试验：临泽草地加密观测区ALOS PALSAR地面同步观测数据集（2008年6月27日）
metadata.description:
The dataset of ground truth measurement synchronizing with ALOS PALSAR was obtained in the Linze grassland foci experimental area on Jun. 27, 2008.
    The data were in FBD mode and HH/HV polarization combinations, and the overpass time was approximately at 23:41 BJT. Observations were carried out in the reed plot A, the saline plot B, the alfalfa plot D and the barley plot E, which were divided into 6×6 subsites, with each one spanning a 120×120 m2 plot. Soil gravimetric moisture, volumetric moisture, and soil bulk density after drying by the cutting ring and the mean soil temperature from 0-5cm by the probe thermometer were measured in A and B; the soil temperature, soil moisture, the loss tangent, soil conductivity, the real part and the imaginary part of soil complex permittivity by the POGO soil sensor, the mean soil temperature from 0-5cm by the probe thermometer, and soil gravimetric moisture, volumetric moisture, and soil bulk density after drying by the cutting ring in D and E.
    Data were archived in Excel file. See WATER: Dataset of setting of the sampling plots and stripes in the foci experimental area of Linze station for more information.
metadata.descriptionCn:
2008年6月27日，在临泽草地加密观测区样方A（芦苇地），样方B（盐碱地），样方D（苜蓿地）和样方E（大麦地）开展了ALOS PALSAR数据的地面同步观测。
ALOS PALSAR数据为FBD模式，HH/HV极化组合方式，过境时间约为23:41BJT。主要观测变量为土壤水分。本数据可为发展和验证主动微波遥感反演土壤水分和土壤盐分算法提供基本的地面数据集。
本数据观测在120m×120m，6Grid×6Grid样方内展开。观测内容为：样方A和样方B采用环刀取土经烘干获得重量含水量、体积含水量及土壤容重；针式温度计获得0-5cm平均土壤温度；样方D和样方E采用POGO便携式土壤传感器获得土壤温度、土壤水分、损耗正切、土壤电导率、土壤复介电常数实部及虚部；针式温度计获得0-5cm平均土壤温度；并采用环刀取土经烘干获得重量含水量、体积含水量及土壤容重。
本数据集包括4个样方的土壤水分测量数据Excel表格。
样方样带的分布信息请参见元数据“黑河综合遥感联合试验：临泽草地加密观测区样方样带布置”。

background: Radar remote sensing has demonstrated its applicability to the retrieval of basin-scale soil moisture. The mechanism of radar backscattering from soils is complicated and strongly influenced by surface roughness. Surface soil moisture (mv) is important in agronomic, hydrological, and meteorological processes at all spatial scales. The ability of inferring mv using both active and passive microwave techniques has been intensively demonstrated. It is well known that space-borne microwave radiometers and scatterometers possess the advantage of high revisit capacity but are deficient in coarse spatial resolution. On the contrary, synthetic aperture radar (SAR) sensors have the capability to provide finer spatial resolution, on the order of tens of meters, meeting most spatial requirements for watershed management and hydrological applications. The advanced IEM (AIEM) improves the calculation accuracy of scattering coefficient by keeping the absolute phase term in Greens function which was neglected by IEM. In the IEM and AIEM, surface roughness is an essential input, thus, if only a single configuration (e.g., one polarization, one frequency) of radar data is available, roughness parameters should be known as a priori information in order to retrieve soil moisture using these models.
research objective: This study aims to simultaneously obtain surface roughness parameters (standard deviation of surface height σ and correlation length cl) along with soil moisture from multi-angular ASAR images by using a two-step retrieval scheme based on the AIEM.
challenges: The key challenge is the presence of vegetation cover, which significantly impacts the estimates of surface roughness and soil moisture. Field measuring surface roughness is very time-consuming and almost impractical at the regional scale. Moreover, appreciable inaccuracies may occur due to various deployments of instrumentation, sampling strategy, and the ambiguous scale effect during field campaigns and data post-processing.
methods: The method firstly used a semi-empirical relationship that relates the roughness slope, Zs (Zs = σ2 /cl) and the difference in backscattering coefficient (Δσ) from two ASAR images acquired with different incidence angles. Then, the deduced roughness parameters were used for the retrieval of soil moisture in association with the AIEM. An evaluation of the proposed method was performed in an experimental area in the middle stream of the Heihe River Basin, where the Watershed Allied Telemetry Experimental Research (WATER) was taken place.
dataset: The study was carried out at one of the W A TER foci experimental areas (FEAs). Linze grassland (LZG; 100 ◦04 ′ E, 39 ◦15 ′ N), which covers an area of 2 × 2 km 2 , locates in Linze county, Zhangye city in the middle stream of the Heihe River Basin. During the field campaigns conducted in the intensive observation period (IOP) from May to August 2008, five experimental sites (ESs), each 360 × 360 m 2 in size, were established. Ground truths, including soil moisture, land surface temperature (T), and bulk density, were collected at all five ESs concurrently with radar acquisitions. ASAR operates at C-band (5.3 GHz) and was launched onboard ENVISAT in 2002. In this investigation, three contiguous ASAR images in alternating polarization precision (APP) modes with different incidence angles ranging from IS1 (18.4 ◦) to IS7 (43.9 ◦) were acquired.
findings: It is demonstrated that the proposed method is feasible to achieve reliable estimation of soil water content.
backgroundCn: 雷达遥感已证明其在流域尺度土壤湿度获取中的适用性。雷达回波从土壤的散射机制复杂，并受到表面粗糙度的强烈影响。表层土壤湿度（mv）在各个空间尺度的农艺、水文和气象过程中都非常重要。利用主动和被动微波技术推断mv的能力已被广泛证明。众所周知，空间borne微波辐射计和散射计具有高重访能力的优势，但在粗空间分辨率方面存在不足。相反，合成孔径雷达（SAR）传感器能够提供更细的空间分辨率，达到数十米，满足流域管理和水文应用的大多数空间需求。先进的IEM（AIEM）通过保留格林函数中的绝对相位项来提高散射系数的计算精度，而该项在IEM中被忽略。在IEM和AIEM中，表面粗糙度是一个重要输入，因此，如果仅有单一配置（例如，一种极化，一种频率）的雷达数据可用，则粗糙度参数应作为先验信息，以便使用这些模型获取土壤湿度。
research objectiveCn: 本研究旨在通过基于AIEM的两步检索方案，同时从多角度ASAR图像中获取表面粗糙度参数（表面高度的标准偏差σ和相关长度cl）以及土壤湿度。
challengesCn: 关键挑战是植被覆盖的存在，这对地表粗糙度和土壤湿度的估计产生了显著影响。现场测量地表粗糙度非常耗时，并且在区域尺度上几乎不切实际。此外，由于仪器部署的不同、采样策略以及现场调查和数据后处理过程中存在的模糊尺度效应，可能会出现显著的不准确性。
methodsCn: 该方法首先使用了一种半经验关系，该关系将粗糙度斜率Zs（Zs = σ2 /cl）与从两个不同入射角获取的ASAR图像的后向散射系数差（Δσ）联系起来。然后，利用推导出的粗糙度参数结合AIEM进行土壤湿度的提取。该方法的评估在黑河流域中游段的一个实验区域进行，该区域进行了水文联合遥测实验研究（WATER）。
datasetCn: 该研究在一个W A TER焦点实验区（FEAs）进行。林泽草原（LZG；100°04′E，39°15′N）位于甘肃省张掖市的林泽县，覆盖面积为2 × 2 km²。在2008年5月至8月的强化观测期（IOP）期间，建立了五个实验站（ESs），每个实验站的大小为360 × 360 m²。在所有五个实验站同时收集了土壤湿度、地表温度（T）和体积密度等地面实测数据，同时进行雷达采集。ASAR在C波段（5.3 GHz）下运行，并于2002年搭载在ENVISAT卫星上。在本次研究中，获取了三幅相邻的ASAR图像，采用交替极化精度（APP）模式，入射角范围从IS1（18.4°）到IS7（43.9°）。
findingsCn: 研究表明，所提方法能够有效实现土壤水分含量的可靠估计。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in estimating soil moisture using radar remote sensing?
Example.QuestionCn: 使用雷达遥感估计土壤湿度时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A key challenge is the presence of vegetation cover, which significantly impacts the estimates of surface roughness and soil moisture, as field measuring surface roughness is time-consuming and impractical at regional scales.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个关键挑战是植被覆盖的存在，这显著影响了地表粗糙度和土壤湿度的估计，因为在区域尺度上，现场测量地表粗糙度既耗时又不切实际。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the significance of using synthetic aperture radar (SAR) sensors in soil moisture retrieval in remote sensing?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在遥感中使用合成孔径雷达（SAR）传感器进行土壤湿度提取的意义是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Synthetic aperture radar (SAR) sensors are significant in soil moisture retrieval due to their ability to provide finer spatial resolution, on the order of tens of meters, which meets the spatial requirements for watershed management and hydrological applications. Unlike microwave radiometers and scatterometers, which have high revisit capacity but coarse spatial resolution, SAR sensors offer improved spatial detail necessary for accurate soil moisture estimation.
Definition.AnswerCn: 合成孔径雷达（SAR）传感器在土壤湿度获取中具有重要意义，因为它们能够提供数十米级的更细空间分辨率，满足流域管理和水文应用的空间需求。与微波辐射计和散射计相比，后者具有较高的重访能力但空间分辨率较粗，SAR传感器提供了更好的空间细节，必要以实现准确的土壤湿度估计。

Definition.QuestionEn: What challenges do vegetation cover pose in the estimation of soil moisture and surface roughness using remote sensing techniques?
Definition.QuestionCn: 植被覆盖在使用遥感技术估算土壤湿度和表面粗糙度时会带来哪些挑战？
Definition.AnswerEn: Vegetation cover poses significant challenges in the estimation of soil moisture and surface roughness using remote sensing techniques because it affects the accuracy of these estimates. It complicates the radar backscattering mechanism and can lead to inaccuracies due to variations in vegetation type, density, and moisture content. Additionally, field measurement of surface roughness under vegetation cover is time-consuming and impractical at regional scales, contributing to potential inaccuracies.
Definition.AnswerCn: 植被覆盖在利用遥感技术估算土壤湿度和表面粗糙度方面带来了显著挑战，因为它影响了这些估算的准确性。植被覆盖使雷达后向散射机制变得复杂，并可能由于植被类型、密度和水分含量的变化而导致不准确。此外，在植被覆盖下进行表面粗糙度的现场测量既耗时又不切实际，尤其是在区域尺度上，这也增加了潜在的不准确性。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the similarities and differences in challenges faced when collecting soil moisture data in the Linze grassland compared to the dense observation area using different radar technologies?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在林泽草原与密集观测区使用不同雷达技术收集土壤湿度数据时面临的挑战有哪些相似之处和不同之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both locations face challenges related to vegetation cover impacting soil moisture estimation. However, the Linze grassland focuses on broader experimental sites with concurrent radar acquisitions, whereas the dense observation area utilizes specific sample plots with detailed measurements. The challenges in Linze also include scale effects and field measurement impracticalities, whereas the dense observation area emphasizes precise data collection methods like drying soil samples for moisture content.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 两个地点都面临植被覆盖影响土壤湿度估计的挑战。然而，林泽草原侧重于更广泛的实验场地，并进行同时的雷达采集，而密集观测区则利用特定的样本地块进行详细测量。林泽面临的挑战还包括尺度效应和现场测量的不便，而密集观测区则强调精确的数据收集方法，如干燥土壤样本以测定湿度含量。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the integration of multi-angular radar data enhance the accuracy of soil moisture retrieval in the presence of surface roughness variability?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 多角度雷达数据的集成如何提高在表面粗糙度变化情况下土壤湿度获取的准确性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration of multi-angular radar data allows for the simultaneous retrieval of surface roughness parameters, which are crucial for accurate soil moisture estimation. This is achieved through a two-step retrieval scheme based on advanced models like AIEM, which can deduce roughness parameters from differences in backscattering coefficients at varying incidence angles.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 多角度雷达数据的集成可以同时获取表面粗糙度参数，这对于准确的土壤湿度估计至关重要。这是通过基于先进模型（如AIEM）的两步检索方案实现的，该方案可以根据不同入射角下的后向散射系数差异推导出粗糙度参数。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the implications of vegetation cover on the accuracy of soil moisture and surface roughness data collection in radar remote sensing experiments?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 植被覆盖对雷达遥感实验中土壤湿度和地表粗糙度数据收集的准确性有何影响？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Vegetation cover poses significant challenges to the accuracy of soil moisture and surface roughness estimations, as it can obscure or alter radar backscatter signals. This necessitates careful consideration of vegetation effects and may require additional data or models to adjust for these influences during data collection and processing.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 植被覆盖对土壤湿度和地表粗糙度估计的准确性构成了重大挑战，因为它可能会遮挡或改变雷达后向散射信号。这需要仔细考虑植被的影响，并可能在数据收集和处理过程中需要额外的数据或模型来调整这些影响。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways can ground truth data, such as soil moisture and bulk density, be effectively integrated with satellite radar data to improve the reliability of soil moisture models?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 如何有效地将地面真实数据，如土壤湿度和体积密度，与卫星雷达数据集成，以提高土壤湿度模型的可靠性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Ground truth data provides essential validation and calibration for satellite radar data, ensuring that models accurately reflect real-world conditions. By collecting concurrent ground truth data during satellite passes, researchers can refine models and parameters, such as surface roughness, to enhance the reliability of soil moisture retrievals from radar remote sensing.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 地面真实数据为卫星雷达数据提供了重要的验证和校准，确保模型准确反映现实条件。通过在卫星经过时收集同时的地面真实数据，研究人员可以优化模型和参数，例如表面粗糙度，从而提高雷达遥感土壤湿度提取的可靠性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes challenges in accurately retrieving soil moisture data from radar remote sensing?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 从雷达遥感中准确获取土壤湿度数据的挑战是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The presence of vegetation cover significantly impacts the estimates of surface roughness and soil moisture. Additionally, field measuring surface roughness is time-consuming and almost impractical at a regional scale, leading to potential inaccuracies due to various instrumentation deployments, sampling strategies, and scale effects during field campaigns and data processing.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 植被覆盖的存在对地表粗糙度和土壤湿度的估计有显著影响。此外，现场测量地表粗糙度耗时且在区域尺度上几乎不切实际，这可能导致由于各种仪器部署、采样策略和现场活动及数据处理中的尺度效应而产生的潜在不准确性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to difficulties in using synthetic aperture radar (SAR) for soil moisture estimation on a basin scale?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响合成孔径雷达（SAR）在流域尺度上进行土壤湿度估计的困难因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The mechanism of radar backscattering from soils is complicated and strongly influenced by surface roughness. If only a single configuration of radar data is available, roughness parameters should be known as a priori information to retrieve soil moisture. Vegetation cover also adds complexity, impacting surface roughness and moisture estimates.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 雷达反向散射从土壤中产生的机制是复杂的，并且受到表面粗糙度的强烈影响。如果仅有单一配置的雷达数据可用，则粗糙度参数应作为先验信息，以便提取土壤湿度。植被覆盖也增加了复杂性，影响表面粗糙度和湿度估计。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of vegetation cover on the estimation of surface roughness and soil moisture using radar remote sensing?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 植被覆盖对使用雷达遥感估算地表粗糙度和土壤湿度的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Vegetation cover significantly impacts the estimates of surface roughness and soil moisture, posing a challenge to obtaining accurate measurements because it complicates the retrieval process and can introduce inaccuracies due to varying field conditions and measurement strategies.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 植被覆盖显著影响地表粗糙度和土壤湿度的估算，这给获取准确测量带来了挑战，因为它使得检索过程变得复杂，并可能由于不同的田间条件和测量策略引入不准确性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective of conducting ground-based synchronous observations alongside ALOS PALSAR satellite data in the Linze grassland area?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在林泽草原地区，进行地面同步观测与ALOS PALSAR卫星数据的主要目的是为了什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The main goal of performing ground-based synchronous observations with ALOS PALSAR data is to develop and validate algorithms for retrieving soil moisture and soil salinity using active microwave remote sensing.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 进行基于地面的同步观测与ALOS PALSAR数据的主要目标是开发和验证使用主动微波遥感获取土壤湿度和土壤盐分的算法。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methods are utilized to account for the impact of vegetation cover on the estimation of soil moisture and surface roughness in radar remote sensing data collection?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在雷达遥感数据收集中，采用了哪些方法来考虑植被覆盖对土壤湿度和表面粗糙度估计的影响？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The methods involve using a semi-empirical relationship that relates roughness slope and the difference in backscattering coefficients from ASAR images with different incidence angles, which helps in deducing roughness parameters and retrieving soil moisture using AIEM.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 这些方法涉及使用一种半经验关系，该关系将粗糙度坡度与不同入射角的ASAR图像的后向散射系数差异联系起来，这有助于推导粗糙度参数并利用AIEM提取土壤湿度。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are followed to extract relevant soil moisture and roughness information from multi-angular ASAR images for hydrological applications?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 从多角度ASAR图像中提取相关土壤湿度和粗糙度信息以用于水文应用的程序是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedure involves a two-step retrieval scheme based on AIEM, where initially, roughness parameters are deduced using a semi-empirical relationship between roughness slope and backscattering coefficient differences, followed by soil moisture retrieval.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 该过程涉及基于AIEM的两步检索方案，首先通过粗糙度斜率与后向散射系数差之间的半经验关系推导出粗糙度参数，然后进行土壤湿度的检索。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methodologies enable the accurate retrieval of soil moisture and surface roughness parameters using remote sensing techniques in areas with significant vegetation cover?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些方法能够在植被覆盖较大的地区，通过遥感技术准确获取土壤湿度和地表粗糙度参数？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The methodologies include using a two-step retrieval scheme based on the Advanced Integral Equation Model (AIEM), which involves a semi-empirical relationship that relates roughness slope and the difference in backscattering coefficient from multi-angular ASAR images acquired at different incidence angles.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 这些方法包括使用基于先进积分方程模型（AIEM）的两步检索方案，该方案涉及一种半经验关系，该关系将粗糙度斜率与在不同入射角下获取的多角度ASAR图像的后向散射系数差异联系起来。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How can the integration of different radar data configurations improve the accuracy of soil moisture retrieval in remote sensing?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 不同雷达数据配置的集成如何提高遥感中土壤湿度检索的准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The integration of radar data configurations, such as multi-angular ASAR images with varying incidence angles, allows for the simultaneous retrieval of surface roughness parameters and soil moisture, which improves the overall accuracy of the retrieval process.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 雷达数据配置的集成，例如具有不同入射角的多角度ASAR图像，可以同时获取表面粗糙度参数和土壤湿度，从而提高检索过程的整体准确性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What are the enabling conditions for conducting effective field campaigns that provide ground truth data for validating remote sensing soil moisture models?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 进行有效的实地调查以提供验证遥感土壤湿度模型的真实数据的促进条件是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Effective field campaigns require concurrent collection of ground truth data, such as soil moisture, land surface temperature, and bulk density, at various experimental sites during intensive observation periods. These campaigns should be aligned with radar acquisitions to ensure reliable validation of remote sensing models.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 有效的实地考察活动需要在密集观测期间，在各个实验地点同时收集地面真实数据，如土壤湿度、地表温度和体积密度。这些活动应与雷达采集相协调，以确保对遥感模型的可靠验证。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the integration of active and passive microwave techniques be expected to improve the retrieval of soil moisture at varying spatial scales?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 主动和被动微波技术的结合预计将改善在不同空间尺度上土壤湿度的获取，原因可能是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The integration of active and passive microwave techniques is anticipated to improve soil moisture retrieval because active techniques like synthetic aperture radar (SAR) can provide finer spatial resolution, while passive techniques like microwave radiometers have high revisit capacity. This combination could potentially overcome the limitations of coarse spatial resolution found in passive methods alone.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 主动和被动微波技术的结合有望改善土壤湿度的获取，因为主动技术如合成孔径雷达（SAR）可以提供更细的空间分辨率，而被动技术如微波辐射计具有较高的重访能力。这种组合有可能克服仅使用被动方法时所面临的粗空间分辨率的限制。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why are field campaigns for measuring surface roughness considered time-consuming and impractical at a regional scale, and how might this affect data collection efforts?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么用于测量地表粗糙度的实地活动被认为是耗时且在区域范围内不切实际，这会如何影响数据收集工作？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Field campaigns for measuring surface roughness are considered time-consuming and impractical at a regional scale due to the extensive manual effort required for accurate measurements and the challenges in deploying instruments and sampling strategies over large areas. This can lead to inaccuracies and inconsistencies in data collection efforts, affecting the reliability of soil moisture retrieval models.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 测量表面粗糙度的实地考察被认为在区域尺度上耗时且不切实际，因为准确测量所需的手动工作量庞大，并且在大面积部署仪器和采样策略时面临挑战。这可能导致数据收集工作中的不准确和不一致，从而影响土壤湿度提取模型的可靠性。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the presence of vegetation cover pose a challenge in estimating surface roughness and soil moisture, and what could be the anticipated impact on data collection methodologies?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 植被覆盖的存在为何可能在估算地表粗糙度和土壤湿度时构成挑战，并且对数据收集方法可能产生什么影响？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Vegetation cover poses a challenge in estimating surface roughness and soil moisture because it can significantly alter radar backscatter signals, complicating the retrieval process. This necessitates the development of more sophisticated data collection methodologies that can account for or mitigate the effects of vegetation, potentially increasing the complexity and cost of data acquisition.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 植被覆盖在估算地表粗糙度和土壤湿度时带来了挑战，因为它可以显著改变雷达后向散射信号，从而使得提取过程变得复杂。这就需要开发更复杂的数据收集方法，以便能够考虑或减轻植被的影响，这可能会增加数据获取的复杂性和成本。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, how could the integration of multi-angular radar images improve the accuracy of soil moisture and surface roughness retrievals?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在您看来，多角度雷达图像的集成如何提高土壤湿度和表面粗糙度检索的准确性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of multi-angular radar images can enhance accuracy by allowing the simultaneous retrieval of surface roughness parameters and soil moisture through a two-step retrieval scheme. This method utilizes a semi-empirical relationship to deduce roughness parameters, which aids in retrieving soil moisture using advanced models like AIEM.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 多角度雷达图像的使用可以通过允许同时检索表面粗糙度参数和土壤湿度来提高准确性，采用两步检索方案。该方法利用半经验关系推导粗糙度参数，从而通过先进模型如AIEM来检索土壤湿度。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don’t understand how surface roughness parameters can be accurately measured in the presence of vegetation cover.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白在植被覆盖的情况下如何准确测量表面粗糙度参数。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The method uses a semi-empirical relationship that relates the roughness slope with the difference in backscattering coefficients from two ASAR images with different incidence angles. This approach helps deduce roughness parameters despite the challenge posed by vegetation cover.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 该方法使用一种半经验关系，将粗糙度坡度与两幅具有不同入射角的ASAR图像之间的后向散射系数差异相关联。这种方法有助于推导粗糙度参数，尽管植被覆盖带来了挑战。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about how multi-angular data from radar images can enhance soil moisture retrieval.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定雷达图像中的多角度数据如何增强土壤湿度的提取。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Multi-angular data allows for the simultaneous retrieval of surface roughness parameters and soil moisture. By using images with different incidence angles, the method can deduce roughness parameters which are then used to retrieve soil moisture in conjunction with the AIEM model.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 多角度数据允许同时获取表面粗糙度参数和土壤湿度。通过使用不同入射角的图像，该方法可以推导出粗糙度参数，然后结合AIEM模型来获取土壤湿度。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of why field measuring of surface roughness is considered impractical at the regional scale.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解为什么在区域尺度上现场测量表面粗糙度被认为是不切实际的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Field measuring of surface roughness is time-consuming and can be inaccurate due to various factors like instrumentation deployment, sampling strategy, and scale effect. These challenges make it almost impractical to conduct such measurements at a regional scale efficiently.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 现场测量表面粗糙度耗时且可能因仪器部署、采样策略和尺度效应等各种因素而不准确。这些挑战使得在区域尺度上高效地进行此类测量几乎不切实际。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the challenges of field measuring surface roughness parameters in the context of soil moisture retrieval using radar remote sensing.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 分析在使用雷达遥感进行土壤湿度获取时，现场测量表面粗糙度参数面临的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The challenges include the presence of vegetation cover, which significantly impacts estimates, the time-consuming nature of field measurements, and the impracticality at a regional scale. Inaccuracies may arise due to various deployments of instrumentation, sampling strategies, and the scale effect during field campaigns and data post-processing.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 挑战包括植被覆盖的存在，这对估算产生显著影响，现场测量的耗时性，以及在区域尺度上的不切实际。由于仪器的不同部署、采样策略以及在现场活动和数据后处理中的尺度效应，可能会出现不准确性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the potential methods for obtaining surface roughness parameters and soil moisture from multi-angular radar images.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨从多角度雷达图像中获取表面粗糙度参数和土壤湿度的潜在方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: One potential method involves a two-step retrieval scheme based on the Advanced Integral Equation Model (AIEM), which uses a semi-empirical relationship to relate roughness slope and backscattering coefficient differences from radar images with different incidence angles. The deduced roughness parameters can then be used to retrieve soil moisture.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 一种潜在的方法涉及基于高级积分方程模型（AIEM）的两步检索方案，该方案使用半经验关系将粗糙度坡度与不同入射角的雷达图像的后向散射系数差异相关联。推导出的粗糙度参数可以用于检索土壤湿度。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please evaluate the feasibility of using synthetic aperture radar (SAR) sensors for soil moisture estimation, considering their spatial resolution and revisit capacity.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请评估使用合成孔径雷达（SAR）传感器进行土壤湿度估计的可行性，考虑它们的空间分辨率和重访能力。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: SAR sensors provide finer spatial resolution on the order of tens of meters, which meets spatial requirements for watershed management and hydrological applications. They offer high revisit capacity, which is advantageous for monitoring soil moisture. This feasibility is demonstrated by the use of SAR images in the Heihe River Basin study, showing reliable soil water content estimation.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: SAR传感器提供的空间分辨率在几十米的范围内，满足了流域管理和水文应用的空间需求。它们具有高重访能力，这对于监测土壤湿度非常有利。这一可行性在黑河流域研究中得到了验证，显示出可靠的土壤水分估计。
